entries.ok: Ok, here is your droid.  Take good care of it.  Come back and talk to me any time.  I sure do like talking to people.
entries.goodbye: Ok goodbye!  Good luck!  Thank you for talking to me....  I'm so lonely.
entries.toomany: You have too many droids.  I thought you were my friend.  But you're just using me to get free droids.  No droids for you!
entries.choose: Which of these fine models would you like?
entries.start: Psst.  Hey.... want a droid?  It's FREE!  No strings attached...
